code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faCaretDown,faCaretRight,faIndianRupeeSign}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const Menu=require('./data/menu.json');const[showMenu,setShowMenu]=useState(Object.fromEntries(Object.keys(Menu).map(category=>[category,false])));const toggleMenu=category=>{setShowMenu({...showMenu,[category]:!showMenu[category]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-5xl menu-title",children:"New Rajshree Sweets Menu"}),Object.keys(Menu).map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-rose-600 hover:bg-rose-700 text-white category-title-wrapper ".concat(showMenu[category]?'active':''),onClick:()=>toggleMenu(category),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl category-title",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:showMenu[category]?faCaretDown:faCaretRight,className:"caret"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"items-container",children:Menu[category].map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-wrapper ".concat(index%2===0?'alternate':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"item-title",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"item-rate",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faIndianRupeeSign})," ",item.rate]})]},index))})]})},category))]});}export default App;
